xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This module provides function that are related to XML Schema support in Zorba.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Cezar Andrei, Matthias Brantner

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function returns the name of the type of the item passed as parameter.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $item the item from which the name of the type should be returned.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: the name of the type (as QName) of the item passed as parameter.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: schema:schema-type
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function schema:schema-type($item as item()) as xs:QName? external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function returns true if the given node has been validated, and false otherwise.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $node the node item that should be checked for validation
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: true if the given node has been validated, false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: schema:is-validated
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function schema:is-validated($node as node()) as xs:boolean external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Updating function that validates the document in place. After the updating query is applied the $node will contain the validated content.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $node the document or element to be validated, otherwise error
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The result of the function is an empty XDM instance and a pending update list that consists the schema:validate-in-place($node)) primitive.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: schema:validate-in-place
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function schema:validate-in-place($node as node()) external
